title: HunyuanVideo-1.5 480P distilled
description: HunyuanVideo-1.5 is a state-of-the-art text-to-video generation model developed by Alibaba's DAMO Academy. It is capable of generating high-quality videos from textual descriptions, leveraging advanced diffusion techniques and large-scale training data. This particular version is a distilled model optimized for 480P video generation, balancing performance and resource efficiency.
